advancements.immersiveweapons.astral_arm: Wear a full set of Astral armor
advancements.immersiveweapons.biohazard_: Obtain a (harmless) biohazard box from a medic station
advancements.immersiveweapons.bloody_sac: Only the bravest souls may take this path

advancements.immersiveweapons.cloud.desc: Walk across cloud blocks high in the air
advancements.immersiveweapons.cloud_marb: Obtain a block of cloud marble
advancements.immersiveweapons.cobalt_too: Obtain a full set of cobalt tools
advancements.immersiveweapons.copper_too: Obtain a full set of copper tools
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_c: Discover a Celestial Tower, a strange otherworldly device capable of summoning minions to fight
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_d: Discover a Dying Soldier, a decaying war-torn soldier still fighting the war
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_e: Discover an Evil Eye, a detached eye which wanders the Deadman's Desert
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_f: Discover a Field Medic, a healer that keeps nearby minutemen in good health
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_h: WITNESS THE POWER OF THE GREAT HANS, BOW BEFORE HIS GREATNESS
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_l: Discover a Lava Revenant, a phantom reborn out of the lava pits of Tiltros
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_m: Discover a Minuteman, a defender ready to protect at a minute's notice
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_r: Discover a Rock Spider, a stone-born spider that's small but just as potent
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_s: Discover a Skeleton Merchant, a trader which resides in lush caves
Discover a Skygazer, a trader which resides in the Starlight Plains
Discover a Star Wolf, a stronger and larger wolf
Discover a Starmite, a pest that lives within Starstorm Crystals
Discover a Storm Creeper, an even more aggressive creeper which packs a bigger boom
advancements.immersiveweapons.discover_w: Discover a Wandering Warrior, a creature of the wilderness
advancements.immersiveweapons.electric_i: Obtain an electric ingot, a rare and powerful energy source
advancements.immersiveweapons.medic_stat: Obtain a Medic Statue, a summoning device within battlefields.
advancements.immersiveweapons.minuteman_: Obtain a Minuteman Statue, a summoning device within battlefields.
advancements.immersiveweapons.molten_arm: Wear a full set of Molten armor
advancements.immersiveweapons.mud.title: Mud!
advancements.immersiveweapons.netherite_: Obtain a netherite arrow and musket ball
advancements.immersiveweapons.overkill.d: Deal 175 damage in a single hit
advancements.immersiveweapons.pike.title: Long Distance Stabbing
advancements.immersiveweapons.root.title: Immersive Weapons
advancements.immersiveweapons.small_part: Obtain a small parts table, a gateway for creating advanced weapons.
advancements.immersiveweapons.starstorm_: Wear a full set of Starstorm armor
advancements.immersiveweapons.swim_in_la: Swim in lava with a full set of Molten armor
advancements.immersiveweapons.tesla_armo: Wear a full set of Tesla armor
Maybe I Am A Tesla Coil
Destroy your wealth by obtaining a Tesla hoe
advancements.immersiveweapons.tesla_ingo: Obtain a Tesla ingot, the answer to your mass energy requirements
advancements.immersiveweapons.tesla_tool: Obtain a full set of Tesla tools
advancements.immersiveweapons.tiltros.ac: Construct and activate a warrior statue
advancements.immersiveweapons.tiltros.az: Craft an Azul Keystone from fragments scattered across the world
advancements.immersiveweapons.tiltros.bi: A ravaged landscape lost in space
advancements.immersiveweapons.tiltros.wa: Craft all three pieces of a warrior statue
A Portal to a Forgotten Land
advancements.immersiveweapons.ventus_arm: Wear a full set of Ventus armor
advancements.immersiveweapons.ventus_too: Obtain a full set of Ventus tools
config.immersiveweapons.blunderbuss_fire: Set the inaccuracy of bullets fired by the Blunderbuss - Default 2.0
Set the velocity of bullets fired by the Blunderbuss - Default 1.7
config.immersiveweapons.bullets_break_gl: Enable bullets breaking glass - Default true
config.immersiveweapons.celestial_tower_:
Multiplier to change the wave size from Celestial Tower summons.
Set less than 1 to reduce, greater than 1 to increase.
Increasing the wave size will negatively affect the server ticks in Tiltros. - Default 1.0

Set the spawn checking radius for the Celestial Tower.
Setting this higher may slightly negatively impact server ticks in Tiltros, but make Celestial Lanterns more effective - Default 128
config.immersiveweapons.cursed_sight_sta: Set the maximum range in blocks of the Cursed Sight Staff - Default 50
config.immersiveweapons.discovery_advanc:
Set the range for checking criteria of the discovery advancement (value is squared) - Default 50
Lowering this value may improve server performance,
config.immersiveweapons.fancy_smoke_gren:
Render smoke grenade particles at 66% of the regular size, spawn 3x more, and add translucency.
This will negatively impact performance, but make smoke grenades appear more realistic. - Default false
config.immersiveweapons.flintlock_pistol: Set the inaccuracy of bullets fired by the Flintlock Pistol - Default 1.75
Set the velocity of bullets fired by the Flintlock Pistol - Default 2.5
config.immersiveweapons.force_smoke_gren:
Force the number of particles produced by the smoke grenade to be the same on all clients.
A value of -1 will not force any value, and will allow clients to use their own values.
Setting this to a high value may cause clients to lag. - Default -1
config.immersiveweapons.gun_crit_chance: Set the chance for a fired bullet to be critical - Default 0.1
config.immersiveweapons.meteor_staff_exp: Set whether the Meteor Staff explosion breaks blocks - Default false
Set the radius of the explosion created by the Meteor Staff - Default 3.0
config.immersiveweapons.meteor_staff_max: Set the maximum range in blocks of the Meteor Staff - Default 100
config.immersiveweapons.musket_fire_inac: Set the inaccuracy of bullets fired by the Musket - Default 0.15
config.immersiveweapons.musket_fire_velo: Set the velocity of bullets fired by the Musket - Default 4.0
config.immersiveweapons.panic_alarm_rang: Set the range of the Panic Alarm's sound - Default 48
config.immersiveweapons.smoke_grenade_pa:
Set the number of particles produced by the smoke grenade
The server may choose to override this value to encourage fairness. - Default 96
config.immersiveweapons.tesla_armor_effe: Enable the Tesla Armor effect sound - Default true
config.immersiveweapons.tiltros_enabled: Enable the Tiltros dimension portal - Default true
death.attack.immersiveweapons.barbed_wir: %s thought it was a bright idea to walk into barbed wire
%s was forced into barbed wire by %s
death.attack.immersiveweapons.bear_trap: %s bled out in a bear trap
%s bled out in a bear trap while %s watched
death.attack.immersiveweapons.bleeding.p: %s bled to death at the hands of %s
death.attack.immersiveweapons.deadmans_d: %s was poisoned by the atmosphere at the hands of %s
%s was poisoned by deathweed at the hands of %s
death.attack.immersiveweapons.explosive_: %s learned to not accept candy from strangers
%s learned to not accept candy from strangers while %s watched
death.attack.immersiveweapons.landmine.p: %s stepped on a landmine because %s pushed them
death.attack.immersiveweapons.meteor.pla: %s was hit by a meteor summoned by %s
death.attack.immersiveweapons.mortar: %s was the target of an artillery attack
death.attack.immersiveweapons.punji_stic: %s was victim to Vietnam-era war tactics
%s was victim to Vietnam-era war tactics by %s
death.attack.immersiveweapons.used_syrin: %s died of hepatitis at the hands of %s

immersiveweapons.item.azul_locator.telep: Teleporting to spawn point in %s seconds...

immersiveweapons.item.bloody_sacrifice.u: There is no going back now...

tooltip.immersiveweapons.accessory_inact: This accessory is inactive - something else is using its accessory slot
tooltip.immersiveweapons.accessory_note: This accessory works while sitting in your inventory
tooltip.immersiveweapons.astral_armor: Improves mobility and allows you to dash forward (Toggleable with your Armor Effect Toggle key)
tooltip.immersiveweapons.astral_arrow: 350% more powerful than normal arrows. Extremely accurate and has minimal falloff.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.astral_gauntlet: Has a 95% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.astral_musket_b: Built from Astral ingots. Not quite as strong as other options but extremely accurate and has little falloff. Pierces through three targets.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.azul_keystone: It resonates with the energy of a lost world
tooltip.immersiveweapons.azul_keystone_f: It vibrates gently in your hand
tooltip.immersiveweapons.azul_locator: Teleport to your spawn point at will
tooltip.immersiveweapons.azul_stained_or: If you lean close enough, you can hear something resonating inside
tooltip.immersiveweapons.bandage: Cover those nasty cuts and scrapes
tooltip.immersiveweapons.barrel_tap: Use this to convert some plants into a fluid form. Connect this to a barrel to collect it.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.bear_trap: You do not have permission to move
tooltip.immersiveweapons.berserkers_amul: Increases melee damage by 20%, and projectile damage by 10%
However, you will take 20% more damage from all sources
tooltip.immersiveweapons.blademaster_emb: Increases melee damage by 10%, and adds a 30% chance to inflict Bleeding
tooltip.immersiveweapons.bloated_heart: Increases maximum health by two hearts
tooltip.immersiveweapons.bloody_sacrific: You feel a dark presence emanating from this item
The destruction of life charges something inside
- 25% chance to roll a second loot drop entirely
Using this would be a grave and permanent mistake
tooltip.immersiveweapons.blunderbuss: Good for hordes a short distance away. A primitive type of shotgun.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.bottle_of_alcoh: You could drink this, but you'll be nauseous. Highly flammable!
tooltip.immersiveweapons.bottle_of_wine: A relaxing combination of sweet berries
tooltip.immersiveweapons.celestial_fragm: The power of the sun in the palm of your hand
tooltip.immersiveweapons.celestial_spiri: When taking damage, there is a 15% chance to summon a meteor
The meteor will only damage the creature that attacked you
tooltip.immersiveweapons.cobalt_gauntlet: Has a 60% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.cobalt_musket_b: A strong and dense musket ball, made from cobalt.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.cobalt_ring: Increase general damage by 2.5% and provides 2.5% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.copper_gauntlet: Has a 45% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.copper_musket_b: A well constructed musket ball, made from copper.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.copper_ring: Increase general damage by 1% and provides 1% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.curse_cleaning_: Cleanses your soul of all curses
tooltip.immersiveweapons.cursed_sight_st: Summon Evil Eyes to curse your enemies
tooltip.immersiveweapons.deadeye_pendant: Increases damage over distance with firearms
Maximum damage increase is 20% at 100 meters
tooltip.immersiveweapons.diamond_gauntle: Has a 75% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.diamond_musket_: A very sharp and powerful musket ball. You're practically throwing away diamonds. Pierces through a single target.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.diamond_ring: Increase general damage by 4% and provides 4% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.emerald_ring: Provides the Hero of the Village effect
tooltip.immersiveweapons.first_aid_kit: An effective method of healing, combining the effects of bandages and painkillers
tooltip.immersiveweapons.flare_gun: Launch bright flares into the sky
tooltip.immersiveweapons.flintlock_pisto: A basic flintlock firearm that excels in medium-range combat.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.gauntlet: Beat the life out of your opponents.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.golden_gauntlet: Has a 35% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.golden_musket_b: Fancier than stone musket balls, but not much better. At least it won't misfire. Look at me! I have money to throw away!
tooltip.immersiveweapons.golden_ring: Increase general damage by 3% and provides 3% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.hans_blessing_1: Take 15% less damage from all sources
tooltip.immersiveweapons.hans_spawn_egg: Summon Hans the Almighty into this world
tooltip.immersiveweapons.iron_gauntlet: Has a 55% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.iron_musket_bal: A hard hitting musket ball, made from iron.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.iron_ring: Increase general damage by 2% and provides 2% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_1: It's like the wrath of gods, Egyptian pharaohs, Chinese monks, and Hans himself.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_2: Ping me if you want more textures, because I probably wont respond.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_4: I don't even think Hans would be able to withstand such pain.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_5: Imagine stubbing your toe into a lego brick that has a tack stuck through the middle.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_6: Exist in the life of a furry on 4chan!
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_7: This is what happens when you nuke yourself in Garry’s mod.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_8: The true for the worthy play through.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_9: If you ever wanted to be put into a mental hospital, this is how you do it.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_ch: Killing things makes me feel funny
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_ef: - 50% chance not to roll loot drops
tooltip.immersiveweapons.jonnys_curse_fu: This is a really bad idea for obvious reasons
tooltip.immersiveweapons.landmine: Bury their leftovers into a soup can
tooltip.immersiveweapons.medal_of_adequa: This medal was once awarded to gamingwarrior0 for his wholly undistinguished assistance
tooltip.immersiveweapons.medic_statue: Something seems to activate inside when it is placed in a Battlefield. It wishes to heal.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.melee_masters_m: Increases melee knockback by 75% and melee damage by 10%
tooltip.immersiveweapons.minuteman_statu: Something seems to activate inside when it is placed in a Battlefield. It wishes to protect.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.molotov_cocktai: Creates a ring of fire upon impact.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.molten_armor: Warm and toasty inside. Allows submersion in lava without burning, and improves vision/movement.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.molten_arrow: 450% more powerful than normal arrows. Burns enemies on impact.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.molten_gauntlet: Has a 95% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.molten_musket_b: A musket ball made from molten metal. Hard hitting and expensive, catches targets on fire. Pierces through three targets.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.molten_tool: Crouching while mining blocks will automatically smelt them
tooltip.immersiveweapons.mortar: Capable of sending exploding shells far into the distance
tooltip.immersiveweapons.mre: Tastes disgusting but at least you won't be hungry for a while
tooltip.immersiveweapons.mud_ball: Throw a ball of mud at something
tooltip.immersiveweapons.musket: A simple firearm designed for long-range combat.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.netherite_arrow: 375% more powerful than normal arrows. Extremely sharp, powerful, and accurate. How can you even afford to shoot these?
tooltip.immersiveweapons.netherite_gaunt: Has an 85% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.netherite_muske: An extremely powerful and skillfully crafted musket ball. For when you need to kill a chicken from the other side of a mountain. Pierces through two targets.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.netherite_ring: Increase general damage by 5% and provides 5% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.netherite_shiel: Provides total immunity to knockback and 3% damage reduction
tooltip.immersiveweapons.painkillers: Feel no pain with a copious amount of pills
tooltip.immersiveweapons.pike: Stab them from way over there
tooltip.immersiveweapons.pitfall: Hide your traps with pitfalls. Pairs well with punji sticks.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.powder_horn: Decreases reload time on firearms by 15%
tooltip.immersiveweapons.punji_sticks: Commit war crimes using Vietnam war tactics
tooltip.immersiveweapons.satchel: Provides a 10% chance not to consume ammo
tooltip.immersiveweapons.smoke_grenade: Creates a thick cloud of smoke upon impact. Good for quickly escaping a situation.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.smoke_grenade_a: Obscure the vision of your enemies from afar
tooltip.immersiveweapons.starstorm_gaunt: Has a 95% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.starstorm_muske: A musket ball made from Starstorm ingots. Strongest caliber in terms of raw damage. Pierces through three targets.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.starstorm_sword: Inflict the wrath of the stars
tooltip.immersiveweapons.stone_arrow: 15% less powerful than normal arrows. Kind of dull and weighs at least a pound.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.stone_gauntlet: Has a 25% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.stone_musket_ba: A very heavy musket ball, and not too accurate. Less likely to cause a misfire than wooden ones.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.tesla_armor: The EMF emitted makes nearby enemies sick (Toggleable with your Armor Effect Toggle key)
tooltip.immersiveweapons.tesla_arrow: 500% more powerful than normal arrows. Weakens enemies on impact.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.tesla_gauntlet: Has a 95% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.tesla_hoe: Good thing you aren't in charge of the US Treasury. Because if you were we'd be broke.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.tesla_musket_ba: Made from a special alloy. Weakens and pierces through three targets.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.used_syringe: If you use this there's a good chance you will die of hepatitis
tooltip.immersiveweapons.ventus_armor: Unlocks a 13.1ft vertical and makes you as light as a feather (Toggleable with your Armor Effect Toggle key)
tooltip.immersiveweapons.ventus_arrow: 450% more powerful than normal arrows. Causes enemies to levitate on impact.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.ventus_gauntlet: Has a 95% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.ventus_musket_b: A musket ball made from Ventus shards. Causes targets to levitate. Pierces through three targets.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.ventus_staff: Teach your enemies the importance of personal space
tooltip.immersiveweapons.warrior_statue: It wants to take you somewhere
tooltip.immersiveweapons.wooden_arrow: 35% less powerful than normal arrows. Highly inaccurate. At this point it's just blunt-force trauma.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.wooden_gauntlet: Has a 15% chance to inflict Bleeding.
tooltip.immersiveweapons.wooden_musket_b: Very inaccurate, and likely to cause a misfire. Why would anyone make wooden musket balls anyway?
tooltip.iwcompatbridge.accessory_note: Equip this in a Curios slot to gain the effect.
